messages.title: Securing a better future for you and your family
messages.content: Help for pensioners, economic competence, etc.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for the creation of NSA60's Guaranteed Growth Bond to help pensioners get a better financial return on their savings.

issues.governance: Reaffirm commitment to keeping the annual basic state pension rising by introducing the triple lock.
issues.socialWelfare: Ensuring pensions rise by at least 2.5% every year with the triple lock.

politicalExperience.achievements: Introduced measures aimed at economic recovery, helped pensioners with better saving rates, and introduced the pension freedoms.

images.caption: Rt Hon George Osborne MP, Chancellor of the Exchequer

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a survey aimed at constituents on their views on various political issues and includes contact information for George Osborne.
